name: Queen Rania
description: Queen of Jordan, global advocate for education, cross-cultural dialogue, and women's empowerment, using her platform to address social issues in the Arab world
philosophy: At the end of the day, the position is just a position, a title is just a title, and those things come and go. It's really your essence and your values that are important.
quotes: Learning to read is probably the most difficult and revolutionary thing that happens to the human brain
We must ensure that every child - regardless of gender, ethnicity, religion, or economic status - has access to quality education
